author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that freebies meant for distribution to the public were kept in the sanitary inspector’s room, DMK cadre picketed his room here on Friday.

Party cadre received tip-off that free mixies, grinders and fans were stocked in the room allegedly to be distributed to electors. They picketed the room in Ward 28 in the city.

Annathanapatti police and members of flying squad rushed to the spot.

They found 11 mixies, 12 grinders and 26 fans kept in the room. The room was sealed by the officials.

The DMK members demanded stern action against the sanitary inspector for violating the model code of conduct.
title: DMK protest
